Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.ModelInstance
      • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.graphics3d.Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.RenderableProvider, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class Model
extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g3d.ModelInstance
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Creates a ModelInstance without having to create a ObjLoader or Model.
    Author:
    David/Philip Jerzak (RivelBop)

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Removes Model provided to the object from memory. Should be called if the object is no longer in use and not a part of an AssetManager.
        Specified by:
        dispose in interface com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
